songs.title: Stay Silent
songs.lyrics:
I keep to myself, 'cus I know that
When I blow up
[?]
Baby pass me the black gat under the seat
World so cold so now we running with heat
Better look over your shoulders before you go to sleep
Don’t step into that kitchen if your stomach is weak
If you can handle the heat
[?]
Mumbling when you speak
Tumbling with your words
Stumbling at your feet
